name: StageFright
tagline: Resources for all things public speaking
body:
:interrobang: Been asked to give a tutorial or presentation at work and realised you have no idea what you are doing?

:interrobang: Wondering how regular conference speakers prepare themselves?

:interrobang: Looking for advise on how to deal with the pressure?

**Enter StageFright!**

(Wait, no, not actual stage fright)

(Well, maybe a bit, but we can help with that)



### How StageFright can help you

We've searched out all the best resources on public speaking and present them to you all in one place. From tips about slide design, to advice on how to deal with nerves, to pointers on improving your call-for-papers submission, we've got it all!



### StageFright is hosted on github

Best of all this project is hosted on github, so if you come across a cool new resource or notice a broken link of typo, simply fork the project. We will love you for it :smiley:
